channel.title: Problem with updating Tor Browser
channel.description:
Hi,
I've been using Whonix with Qubes however i am not able to update Tor Browser through the updater menu in Qubes. For a while now, the browser has said an update is available (*Restart to update Tor Browser*) within disposable qubes however there is no new package when updating through Qubes.
Is there a different way you are supposed to update Tor or an i missing something?
Thanks.
